Equipment Actions.Action 1: Scepter, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Bludgeoning plus 14 Lightning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Unarmed Strike, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Kuo-Toa makes 2 Melee attacks

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Kuo-Toa can breathe air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Otherworldy Perception, The Kuo-Toa can sense the presence of nearby creatures that are invisible or on the Ethereal Plane
Abilities.Ability 3: Slippery, The Kuo-Toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple
Abilities.Ability 4: Sunlight Sensitivity, While in sunlight, the Kuo-Toa has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checksthat rely on sight
Abilities.Ability 5: Spellcasting, The Kuo-Toa is a 10th level spellcaster with a number of Cleric spells prepared
